name: ASMR: The Game
description:
PLEASE READ: 

This game was made for the A Game By Its Cover game jam. Inspired by the MY Famicase Exhibition entry ASMR: The Game by Jordan Rosenberg. Developed using Game Maker: Professional. Featuring slowed down music from Mengico and plundered audio from FrivolousFox ASMR, ASMR Darling, and SophieMichelle ASMR. 

HOW TO PLAY:

ASMR: The Game is an audio/visual experience ideally played in a quiet, peaceful environment with headphones as it uses ADVANCED STEREO AUDIO. If you experience any visual clipping in certain areas of the screen PLEASE RESTART THE GAME.

CONTROLS:

This game is one opening menu and thee levels long. To advance to the next level hold the SPACE button down. Each level has one constant audio track playing and thee optional tracks. To add these additional tracks press the Z, X, or C key. Please relax and enjoy.  :)
